sources.title: Timelock (1996) Imprisoned For Life... An Eternity For Revenge | Sci-Fi Action film
sources.description:
It's the 23rd century, and the world's most dangerous criminal has taken over the maximum security prison on asterod Alpha 4. Caught in the middle are Riley and McMasters who must outsmart the chaos and a gang of rowdy inmates to survive. 

Director: Robert Munic
Writers: Rob Moretti, Robert Munic

Main cast:
Maryam d'Abo - Riley
Arye Gross - McMasters
Jeffrey Meek - Jessie Teegs
J. Trevor Edmond - Emil
John Stanisci - Burke
Martin Kove - Riker
Corbin Bernsen - Adams

Genres: Science Fiction, Action
Release date: 1996
Filming location: Scotland, UK

00:00 — Full movie with subtitles
02:05 — Riley sizes up Alpha Four: “Cages are just puzzles someone hasn’t solved yet.” 
05:58 — After a collar zaps an inmate: “That wasn’t punishment—that was a product demo.” 
09:45 — Mess hall read: “You don’t need friends here. You need leverage.” 
12:40 — Laying out the plan: “We’re not stealing money; we’re stealing time.” 
16:20 — In the conduits: “Every blind spot was designed by a tired engineer.” 
19:50 — Near-catch escape: “If they were smarter, we’d be dead already.” Cocky, but earned.
24:10 — Finance node breach: “Audits see numbers; we’ll be the decimals.” 
43:20 — NID desync moment: “Sixty seconds of mercy. Spend it wisely.” 
50:10 — Betrayal revealed: “Some people don’t pick a side—they rent it.” 
54:00 — EVA catwalk: “Space doesn’t hate you. It just doesn’t notice.” 
57:05 — Hangar firefight: “Cover isn’t safety—it’s a suggestion.” 
1:00:30 — Shuttle ignition under pressure: “We don’t need forever. We need now.” 
1:05:20 — Moral coda: “Freedom’s not leaving—it’s choosing.”

metadata.Plot: In the 23rd century, a penal colony in a distant galaxy falls into anarchy when an inmate loads a virus into the computer system. While cryonic suspension was used to control the most dangerous criminals there, with the computers down these deadly men are back in circulation and determined to cause mayhem. With a gang of brilliant but dangerous inmates in control, a petty thief and the driver of the prison shuttle must stand against these lawless men for their own survival.
metadata.Actors: Maryam d'Abo, Arye Gross, Jeffrey Meek
